verses.verse: And I <S%G2504><s%>, brothers <S%G80><s%>, when I came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>, came <S%G2064><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> with <S%G2596><s%> excellency <S%G5247><s%> of speech <S%G3056><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> of wisdom <S%G4678><s%>, declaring <S%G2605><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> the testimony <S%G3142><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> I determined <S%G2919><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> to know <S%G1492><s%> any thing <S%G5100><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>, except <S%G1487><s%> <S%G99999><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> him <S%G5126><s%> crucified <S%G4717><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> speech <S%G3056><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> preaching <S%G2782><s%> was not <S%G3756><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> enticing <S%G3981><s%> words <S%G3056><s%> of man <S%G442><s%>'s wisdom <S%G4678><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> demonstration <S%G585><s%> of the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of power <S%G1411><s%>:

That <S%G2443><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> should not <S%G3361><s%> stand <S%G5600><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the wisdom <S%G4678><s%> of men <S%G444><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the power <S%G1411><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> we speak <S%G2980><s%> wisdom <S%G4678><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> them <S%G3588><s%> that are perfect <S%G5046><s%>: yet <S%G1161><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> the wisdom <S%G4678><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> world <S%G165><s%>, nor <S%G3761><s%> of the princes <S%G758><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> world <S%G165><s%>, that <S%G3588><s%> come to nothing <S%G2673><s%>:

But <S%G235><s%> we speak <S%G2980><s%> the wisdom <S%G4678><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> a mystery <S%G3466><s%>, even the hidden <S%G613><s%> wisdom <S%G3739><s%>, which God <S%G2316><s%> ordained <S%G4309><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> the world <S%G165><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%>:

Which <S%G3739><s%> none <S%G3762><s%> of the princes <S%G758><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> world <S%G165><s%> knew <S%G1097><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> had <S%G1487><s%> they known <S%G1097><s%> it <S%G4717><s%>, they would not <S%G3756><s%> have <S%G302><s%> crucified <S%G4717><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> of glory <S%G1391><s%>.

But <S%G235><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> it is written <S%G1125><s%>, Eye <S%G3788><s%> <S%G99999><s%> has <S%G1492><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> seen <S%G1492><s%>, nor <S%G2532><s%> <S%G99999><s%> ear <S%G3775><s%> heard <S%G191><s%>, neither <S%G2532><s%> has entered <S%G305><s%> <S%G99999><s%> into <S%G1909><s%> the heart <S%G2588><s%> of man <S%G444><s%>, the things which <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> has prepared <S%G2090><s%> for them <S%G3588><s%> that love <S%G25><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> has revealed <S%G601><s%> them unto us <S%G2254><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> his <S%G846><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> searches <S%G2045><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%>, Yes <S%G2532><s%>, the deep things <S%G899><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> man <S%G444><s%> knows <S%G1492><s%> the things <S%G3588><s%> of a man <S%G444><s%>, except <S%G1487><s%> <S%G99999><s%> the spirit <S%G4151><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> which is <S%G3588><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> him <S%G846><s%>? Even <S%G2532><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> the things <S%G3588><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> knows <S%G1492><s%> no man <S%G3762><s%>, but <S%G1487><s%> <S%G99999><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> have received <S%G2983><s%>, not <S%G3756><s%> the spirit <S%G4151><s%> of the world <S%G2889><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> the spirit <S%G4151><s%> which is <S%G3588><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>; that <S%G2443><s%> we might know <S%G1492><s%> the things that <S%G3588><s%> are freely given <S%G5483><s%> to us <S%G2254><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>.

Which things <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> we speak <S%G2980><s%>, not <S%G3756><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the words <S%G3056><s%> which man <S%G442><s%>'s wisdom <S%G4678><s%> teaches <S%G1318><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> which <S%G1722><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> teaches <S%G1318><s%>; comparing <S%G4793><s%> spiritual things <S%G4152><s%> with spiritual <S%G4152><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> the natural <S%G5591><s%> man <S%G444><s%> receives <S%G1209><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> the things <S%G3588><s%> of the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> they are <S%G2076><s%> foolishness <S%G3472><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>: neither <S%G2532><s%> <S%G99999><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> he know <S%G1097><s%> them <S%G3754><s%>, because they are spiritually <S%G4153><s%> discerned <S%G350><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> he that <S%G3588><s%> is spiritual <S%G4152><s%> <S%G99999><s%> judges <S%G350><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%>, yet <S%G1161><s%> he himself <S%G846><s%> is judged <S%G350><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> no man <S%G3762><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> has known <S%G1097><s%> the mind <S%G3563><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%>, that <S%G3739><s%> he may instruct <S%G4822><s%> him <S%G846><s%>? But <S%G1161><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> the mind <S%G3563><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%>.
